column4: Apply company standard operating procedures Apply company occupational safety and health (OSH) policies Explain procedures on service manual Explain procedures for shop maintenance Explain principle operation of brake system Identify types of brake system Identify brake system components and it's functions Diagnose brake system malfunction Apply procedures for disassembly and assembly of brake system Apply procedures for repairing brake system Apply of basic/special/measuring tools and equipment Apply standard torques values, clearances and limits Apply standard adjustment/settings for brake system Perform final Inspection of brake system
column6: Written Examination Interview Oral Questioning Practical examination Demonstration
